requestBody.title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt API Trace

data.title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Lead Capture and Qualification Lifecycle. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Read reporting endpoints and verify booking totals, counts, and statuses align with saga actions.
data.expectedResult: Reported metrics match booking actions and highlight any discrepancies for schema/API iteration.
